item.title: What Is Strapi Headless CMS?
item.description: Strapi is an open-source headless CMS, and comes in three flavors: open-source Community Edition, self-hosted paid Enterprise Edition and fully managed Strapi Cloud. There is a marketplace for adding various integrations and plugins to enhance the base feature set.
